plot: Several couples discover the amazing world of pregnancy at the same time. Interlaced stories describe their very different reactions towards the same happy ending.
title: El pan debajo del brazo
plot_es: Several couples discover the amazing world of pregnancy at the same time. Interlaced stories describe their very different reactions towards the same happy ending.
plot_en: Several couples discover the amazing world of pregnancy at the same time. Interlaced stories describe their very different reactions towards the same happy ending.
